name: Mario Andretti
introduction: Mario Gabriele Andretti (born February 28, 1940 in Montova, d'Istria, Italy (now Motovun, Croatia)) is a retired racing driver, who is one of the most successful Americans in motorsport and its most successful in Formula One, winning a World Championship in 1978.  He also won the Indianapolis 500 in 1969.  He is one of a few drivers to score a pole position on his dbut. He is also the only person to win the World Championship, the Indianapolis 500, and the Daytona 500 stock car race.
